an5.89:1.1: “These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.89:1.3: They relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they don’t review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.89:1.4: These five things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.89:2.1: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
an5.89:2.3: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company. And they review the extent of their mind’s freedom.
an5.89:2.4: These five things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
